page.title: 13Biography
page.content: Two Knighton Town Councillors live in the Bailey_Hill Garth area. Mr Derek Price has served the Knighton Council for eight years and is now doing his second term as mayor of Knighton. He lives in a nine year old house on Garth Hill. A family man, and native of Knighton. He has a building business. He is also the fourth generation of his family to be town crier of Knighton. He does his job voluntarily, mainly for charities. His father received half a crown for five cries and his grandfather's fee was five cries for six_pence. Mrs Davies of Cwn Gilla farm is a member of Knighton Town Council. she was mayoress to Knighton's first lady mayor. The mayor in her own right. She is more interested in people and the community than farm life.
